name: We Love Goblins
description:
The randomly generated hero fights against random pixel-perfect goblins.  The development team @sinabarlas and @Mawerlick. 

Special Thanks to @EceTarhan for her contributions. Music-> tavern music:https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/royalty-free-music/celtic-fantasy, dungeon music: https://wingless-seraph.net/en/material-music_dangeon.html, the font used: https://www.fontspace.com/diary-of-an-8-bit-mage-font-f28455
